price: [Yaa Muhammad!] “dachii keessa deemaatii akkaataa Rabbiin uumuu itti jalqabe ilaalaa! Sana booda Allaahn kaasiinsa boodaa ni kaasa. Dhugumatti, Rabbiin waan hunda irratti danda’aadha” jedhiin.
arabic: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ بَدَأَ ٱلۡخَلۡقَۚ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ يُنشِئُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul sīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa bada-a al-khalqa thumma al-lahu yunshi-u al-nashata al-ākhirata inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
